front.title: IEEE/ISO/IEC Telecommunications and exchange between information technology systems -- Requirements for local and metropolitan area networks -- Part 3: Standard for Ethernet AMENDMENT 4: Physical layers and management parameters for 50 Gb/s,200 Gb/s, and 400 Gb/s operation over single-mode fiber
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2018 adds Physical Layer (PHY) specifications and management parameters for 50 Gb/s, 200 Gb/s, and 400 Gb/s operation over single-mode fiber with reaches of at least 40 km.
